General.Name: Hour Loop Inc
General.Description: Hour Loop, Inc., an online retailer, engages in e-commerce retailing business in the United States. The company sells products in various categories, including home/garden décor, toys, kitchenware, apparel, and electronics products. It sells its products through hourloop.com, as well as third-party marketplaces, including Amazon, Walmart, eBay, and Etsy. Hour Loop, Inc. was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Redmond, Washington.
General.Address: 8201 164th Avenue NE, Redmond, WA, United States, 98052-7615
